decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement, A001-PA, A002-PA, A003-PA, A004-PA, A00LB, B001-PA Rev. B, B002-PA Rev. C, B003-PA Rev. B, B004-PA Rev. B. Received: 12/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, a part first floor side extension and a rear roof extension with two roof windows to front elevation
